node.html:
• Developed and shipped highly interactive web applications for Apple Music using Ember.js
  • Built and shipped the Apple Music Extension within Facebook Messenger leveraging third-party and internal APIs
  • Architected and implemented the front-end of Apple Music's embeddable web player widget, which lets users log in and listen to full songs in the browser
  • Contributed extensively to MusicKit.js, a JavaScript framework that allows developers to add an Apple Music player to their web apps

• Developed and shipped highly interactive web applications for Apple Music using Ember.js
  • Built and shipped the Apple Music Extension within Facebook Messenger leveraging third-party and internal APIs
  • Architected and implemented the front-end of Apple Music's embeddable web player widget, which lets users log in and listen to full songs in the browser
  • Contributed extensively to MusicKit.js, a JavaScript framework that allows developers to add an Apple Music player to their web apps

• Worked wwith a team of developers and architects to create a migration strategy for transitioning a monolithic system to a microservices-based architecture.
  • Helped solidify a brand direction for blistabloc that spans both packaging and web
  • Interfaced with clients on a weekly basis, providing technological expertise

• Developing modern and efficient API's for both external clients and internal projects.
  • Working with a variety of different languages, frameworks and technologies such as C#/.NET, Javascript, Azure DevOps, OpenShift , Kubernetes and Docker
  • Communicating with teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis
